stable.changelog:
- (NEW) Support for immersive mode
- (NEW) Update switch design to Material3
- (NEW) Settings screen style
- (NEW) Support request ignore battery optimization
- (FIX) Pin hide albums, don't ignore nomedia method
- (FIX) Video player not show in list selections in some OEMs
- (FIX) Nullpointer exception for some Android versions
- (FIX) Partially fixed webp image rotation in 90
- (FIX) 32bits real colors decoder issues
- (FIX) Menu text padding
- (IMP) Update theme colors and use color harmonization
- (IMP) Remove some duplicates in request files permission
- (IMP) Support webm video format
- (IMP) Support raw format, works only select raw file in external explorer
- (IMP) Don't use hardware rendering in thumbnails cache loader, its causes unnecessary battery usage
- (OTR) Update AndroidX to gradle 8.1.1
- (OTR) Small bugs fixes and improvements
- (OTR) Internal cleanings and optimizations
- (OTR) Update translations
